Author: markybee0
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: There is an update on the SPARC website.So it looks as though this coin is very much alive.  Message from the Exec team Strategic postponement of ICO - Details below  2017 saw SPARC gain significant traction and interest as we have developed strategic collaborations and partnerships with key stakeholders and investors. The SPARC team has grown to include a CFO, new experienced advisers, and more excited engineers.  Due to significant Canadian interest in SPARC, we are in a strong financial position. Given this opportunity, we have the chance to distribute tokens more strategically to the benefit of all participants.  2018 is forecasted to be the year of growth in decentralized applications. SPARC's technology is designed to facilitate this growth by providing a complimentary and cost-effective distributed application layer to other more-expensive distributed asset layers.  In 2018 We will:  Collect large regional users & suppliers of compute power and work with them to migrate to our technology. Leverage larger projects to create common SDKs for individuals and smaller researchers. Release the Distributed Compute Protocol© & grow the network before public ICO Help to grow a local university's distributed application incubator. Distribute token grants to strategic users of compute power. Our Next Development Steps:  SPARC is collaborating with an S&P/TSX 60 compute supplier in a closed beta-test. They will be computing an astronomy project for a large group of Canadian researchers. A complimentary astronomy SDK is being created in parallel for release to other project groups. Public beta-test of SPARC to begin in coming weeks. Launch of MVP shortly after. Our Next Funding Steps:  Mid-December 2017, Doyle Capital Management, NYC, invested a significant amount of pre-seed funding into SPARC’s economy. Upon the successful outcome of SPARC’s pilot project, SPARC will hold a private seed round led by Doyle Capital Management. Launch large-scale marketing campaign through an established Canadian firm, announcing successful pilot projects and strategic partnerships. Launch of public ICO summer 2018, date to be announced.

Author: markybee0
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Its looking like 2018 could be a good year for SPARC.I emailed the team a few days ago and just got a reply:  Good evening Mark,   Indeed I would like to assure you that we are on a good trajectory to hold a successful ICO this summer (intentions for Aug). I would be happy to have a detail conversation with you. Essentially: 1. We have secured partnerships with major customers (MOU with Compute Canada and the Centre for Advanced Computing) 2. We have begun discussions with major compute suppliers (Major Canadian Telecom companies that we cannot announce publicly yet) 3. We have the backing of important investors from the states and are currently organizing a series A for April. 4. We are testing, validating and benchmarking our technology/compute platform with the Centre for Advanced Computing. 5. We are preparing to be listed on two major exchanges by the ICO this summer. 6. We've expanded our team to include new expert developers, a CFO and a COO.   Its certainly worth holding on to your SPARC.   Dan  ......  Also SPARC's twitter account is full of updates on what the team have done and are doing.Its well worth a visit.I wish i bought some more SPARC at the ICO when it was about $0.01 each.

Author: John Cryp
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Congratz on finishing the pre sale. What are the main reasons to move main ICO to beginning of next year?

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: We would be happy to provide you with whatever details you like. We have been doing some experimenting with iphone power consumption while doing mathematical computations; very promising results will be announced shortly. There is a lot of computational power in everybody's pocket that hasn't been tapped yet. I would welcome you to the project. Douglas - CEO

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Thanks for the question! Actually the pre sale hasn't ended as we want to make the bonus deal available for everyone who believes in our mission. But to answer your question, we want to focus on developing the team and the platform to prove that not only will it work but it will be capable of being the largest distributed supercomputer ever. Once we do that, we should be able to have a successful ICO. Presently the early believers are getting in on the best deal and thereby helping us to achieve that goal.  Douglas - CEO

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: We welcome other competitors in this space - the demand for computation is huge compared to the supply. And, as to your question: great question. We have delayed the ICO so that we can add people to the team and get the platform built out enough to provide a use for subscribers as you call them. Building the network will require marketing, planning, as well as ensuring that people are being adequately compensated for their devices. We have been doing experiments in the lab recently involving power consumption and cost. We will have some announcements about that as well as additions in the whitepaper. Bottom line: we will be able to offer a lower price and still be able to pay the device owner a profit on his power usage. If you and people like you get your own devices working on the network we will surely have enough users! Douglas - CEO

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Much as the old saying goes about the cobbler whose children walk barefoot, for a web company our website has been shamefully inadequate. Point well taken. However, there was never any intent to disrespect you. We have been spending our energies building the core project. However, there is a new site on the way imminently. In the next few hours we will have a great website at last!  We are looking forward to announcing it and I look forward to your honest feedback. Douglas - CEO

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Thank you Dimitri! I welcome you to stay tuned! There will never be a better time than now to take advantage of the presale bonus.  Douglas - CEO

Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Cryptonomos is a successful hosting and marketing platform for worthy partners in the blockchain space. Sparc takes advantage of Cryptonomos’ technology and expert guidance at every stage of the token sale to ensure the utmost security and success of the ICO. Technology o Secure user account and wallet o Secure collection of funds o Token distribution oversight o Smart contract and token development  Framework o Token economics o Legal analysis o Token holder agreements and disclosures o Design and presentation o Escrow services  Marketing o Early-backer engagement o Marketing and Public Relations campaigns o Community channel management  The Sparc team is able to focus its attention on developing the protocol and technology while relying on Cryptonomos to provide ancillary services at a high level of quality and security. The result of this partnership will be a greater assurance of success in reaching the brand goals as well as the deployment of the promised project on a timely basis. -- Douglas - CEO

Author: pikkie
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: hmm supercomputer remind me of sonm, what is the difference of sparc with sonm?

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Good question. Whereas Golem and Sonm are targeting the native realm using docker contianers and GO (language), we are targeting the web realm, using web-standard technologies and the node package manager. Whereas Golem and Sonm are building application layers, we are pushing for a protocol that pairs with the ip suite (https/tcp/ip). We plan to promote the specification as a general purpose dynamic compute protocol. Golem and Sonm are great projects in their own right - this is how we differ.  -- Dstewart CEO

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: I’m so proud of the team that has been hard at work moving this project forward at a blistering pace. Just a few highlights:  - We’ve got some really great results from our benchmarking of mobile devices - we’ll be announcing some results in the days to come but the early returns show that we are going to be able to significantly outdo existing centralized infrastructure in cost while providing the miners with a healthy profit on their power consumption.  - The math team continues to impress as they build the world’s first Bessel, Cephes and other functions for ES6. The basic network architecture and package exchange mechanism is continuing to grow … exciting times for this dev team!  - SPARC continues to be distributed through the Alpha version - now in week six! There will be an announcement soon from this team regarding the specifics of the BOINC community gains.  We’re really starting to gain momentum, team members and funders - the excitement is palpable.  More to come!  Douglas, CEO

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Dear SPARC Early Supporters,     Thank you all for coming in early to support the development of our distributed supercomputer! We’re incredibly excited to deliver to market a potentially world-changing technology. In order to do so, we have decided that it would be to the benefit of both the SPARC platform and its token holders to bolster our product by onboarding additional developers and programmers.     We’ll be able to package together an extremely exciting technological offering for later stage token buyers by postponing our ICO until the beginning of 2018. Please take comfort in knowing that you will have received the absolute best bonus we will offer to any token buyer, and get ready for a stronger, more powerful SPARC!     All our best,  Douglas - CEO, and all of us at Team SPARC

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: There are two important points here: 1/ The demand for computational capacity is growing such that there is a vast amount of room for many players. It is not a zero sum equation: golem winning does not mean sparc losing or vice versa. 2/ Sparc is harnessing the very latest web technology to allow for a far wider user base than any distributed network to date. Presently our in-house team of computational math programmers are building the world's first ever ECMAscript set of math libraries which will harness WebGL2.0 to marry the web interface with the low-level hardware. Other projects are harnessing different technology which, if developed properly, will no doubt have success as well.

Author: Dastewart
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: A word about the current concerns about ICOs and crypto currency in general: Recently many nations and financial institutions have made statements about their desire to ban and or regulate this phenomenon. The main reason is a very rational desire to create as safe and stable a market as possible. There have indeed been abuses and fraud as well as outrageous security lapses on the part of companies in this space. This tarnishes the reputations of the legitimate and important companies (such as SPARC and its competitors) taking root right now who are utilizing this transformative financial mechanism.  We at SPARC believe that more regulation and scrutiny will strengthen the overall opportunity that this community represents and welcome it. This will, in the end, provide more value for all. ~Douglas CEO

We're analyzing the data we received and will be making decisions tomorrow on the SPARC distribution numbers.  Please if you find any errors, or have any feed-back comment here or e-mail us at admin@kingsds.network . This still early days for us and we are eager to hunt bugs/user experience problems.  Also: when you add new projects it make take 24 hours for your CPID to be verified. (green checkmark). We are working to make this process more immediate.

Author: Seyico2011
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: It sound interesting but what I found difficult to understand is, the project 1 that worth $5 million going to be a collective involvement or individual?

Author: KingsDS
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Hi Seyico!  Sorry, I am having trouble understanding your question, but I will try to answer.  The project is created and being run by a single company. Kings Distributed Systems owns and operates all the proprietary code etc.  There are other projects who we are interfacing with, such as BOINC, but they are not directly affiliated with us. We are however getting involved with their open source development, and have access to some individuals from BOINC who would like to support our growth. Although they are very interested in being in the cryptocurrency space, because they are american non-profits who get grants from government foundations they are restricted from doing so.  This is where we come in! They are happy to have us market their network using our own crypto coin.  While our Alpha will be interfacing with BOINC, we plan to launch our own peer-network as soon as possible, as this will allow us to begin marketing to commercial projects. The plan is to have our proprietary network released in Q1 2018.  I hope that answers your questions. Please if you would like, you can ask for more clarification.   Our Presale begins in less then 24 hours! Tomorrow July 27th at 11AM EST (New York time) we will be launching the sale capped at 1000 ETH. The sale is designed to reward early adopters, help us release our alpha, and build up to a larger initial coin offering.  You can see more at http://kingsds.network  Join us in slack, or sign up for the ICO News e-mail list and we will be notifying everyone when it has begun.

Author: KingsDS
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: All universities have access to supercomputers one way or another, some have them in house and some are contracted to non-profits.  Much of this funding comes from governments in one way or another.  These computers are very expensive and constantly need to be updated with new hardware, and we are looking to replace this process. As we grow we will be bidding for these government and university grants, so they may contract us to be their supercomputer supply.  As you may know demand exceeds supply! There is a constant line for these computers at universities, and this even after it has been carefully distributed. There are many researchers who would like to do a lot more, but simply cannot get access to the supercomputer time at their university.  If there is one thing all scientists have in common, it is that they want more computer power. Our distributed network is more cost-efficient then running hardware centers and that is where our advantage comes. We are the cheaper, and more powerful solution.  We are looking at both of these segments, picking up the central contracts themselves, and also the excess demand.  You can find more information on how this demand comes on the technology page of our website: http://kingsds.network/technology.html  Have a look at the usecase example to see how more supply is creating more demand.

Author: KingsDS
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Community Questions with Answers:  How is your coin different from other Supercomputer Coins like SONM and Golem?  It is true, we are very similar to these coins, and we are proud to be so! We think Golem is a valuable token and we will be happy to collaborate with them in the future.  We believe Supercomputer coins are the most valuable tokens out there. They are tied to computer resources which makes them strong assets.  In doing our market research we've reached out to a number of organizations and found the demand for supercomputers is endless, and ever growing with new AI around the corner. There is a lot of revenue in this vast industry, and this will require many networks to handle the load as we target different sections of the market.  While SONM and Golem are targeting commercial applications, we are focused on Educational and Research institutions.  As well, Golem is a Polish company, and SONM is from Russia. While I'm sure they will do well in Europe, we are a Canadian company and will have advantage over them in the North American market.     Isn't your $5 Million USD minimum cap to high?  Part of what makes a token successful his hitting their critical mass. It order to protect your purchase, and our company, we have set a minimum that will achieve this critical mass. We feel we may have trouble living up to the standards of the cryptocommunity below this amount. Compared to similar projects we think we will get past this barrier easily, but we have set it there for you so that you can be sure of your purchase.     Similar projects have failed to deliver so far, what makes SPARC different?  Our team is what sets us apart! We have been working together already for many years. We have another successful company which is still growing! (QuetzalPOS.com). While we cannot speak as to the reasons that other projects are behind schedule, what separates us is that we are comfortable with our teammates. We know each others skills, assets, and development speeds so we can effectively plan for the future.     We need more information!?  At KingsDS we believe in minimalism, so our website, like our code, contains only the information that is necessary, no buzzwords or bullshit! The majority of the information about the project is contained in the whitepaper, and we would recommend to each of you to download it and read it through. It is direct to the point, and not too difficult to read. It is important that you understand the tokens you are purchasing before you put in your hard earned money! Please if you have any questions ask them in this forum and we will respond promptly. The whitepaper is in the process of being translated into different languages, if you do not speak English well, let us know which language you are looking to read from.

Author: KingsDS
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Simply put, the market for this type of coin is huge. There will be many networks required to handle the load, even we expect to see more arrive in the future.  What makes us different?  We are targeting the North American market, whereas Golem, Iex.ce and SONM are all in Europe. We don't consider Elastic to be a competitor. After watching their project and github, we believe they do not have the budget or developers to compete, but we wish them all the best!  You may ask, how does a global network target a geographical market?  Although anyone around the world can connect and use our network for projects, the majority of this space is covered by Universities and Research Institutions. These institutions require a more hands on approach to marketing, and it will be necessary for us to approach them directly and help them migrate work onto our network. Golem (Polish), SONM (Russian) and Iex.ce (French) are focused more on private commercial applications however we expect they will eventually realize this mistake and focus their marketing to European Research Institutions, leaving North American Universities and Researchers to a closer team. That team is us!  What they may not realize is that Research is the underpinning of the supercomputer world. Where private businesses are volatile in their computing needs, Research allows us to provide a steady supply of work to our miners. We will be building this steady base through careful approach before layering a more volatile commercial market on top.  We are based in Kingston Ontario which is home to both the Royal Canadian Military College and Queens University, the oldest in Canada. We have many friends at these institutions and are in the process of connecting with them, and their supercomputing departments.

Author: KingsDS
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Presale  Since announcing our technology we have been contacted by some major organizations who are interested in partnering with us. These partnerships will take some time to organize and bring great value. Therefore we have decided it is in the interest of our company to delay the crowdsale by approximately 2 months. The October 1st date is not set in stone, and will be subject to changes.  Instead we are looking at raising a small amount in a first round Presale in order to move our company to the next level. This will go towards marketing materials and partnerships leading up to the crowdsale date, as well as continued development of the product.  Our Alpha is ahead of schedule and we plan to continue with its release before the ICO begins.  The Presale will be offered on July 27th starting at 11AM EST with a 100% bonus. It will be capped at 1000 ETH.  Date: July 27th 2017 11AM EST Cap:                         1000 ETH Bonus:                           100% Ratio:     1 ETH : 20,000 SPARC   Road Map  Our road map in the next few weeks is as follows:  July 27th    - Open Presale Mid August - Open Alpha Sept 1st     - Continue ICO Campaign  During this time we expect to make some major steps forward with valuable partnerships.    Bounties  We would like to apologize to those who have already begun to work for our bounty campaign. It will be put on hold until we resume with the ICO around September 1st.  Your bounties will not be lost. Any work you have already done will be counted when the campaign continues. We thank you for your understanding.     Along with this announcement we are proud to welcome a new member of our team:  Anne Vivian-Scott, MBA, PEng - Commercial Advisor President and CEO BKIN Technologies - http://www.bkintechnologies.com/  "The majority of my career has been occupied by the challenging task of commercializing university-based research discoveries into meaningful products and services. The KDS initiative is a timely innovation that will have the full support of researchers requiring distributed supercomputing power."   Thank You,  The KDS Team

Author: KingsDS
Title: [ANN][ICO] Presale Active - SPARC Supercomputer Coin
Body: Glad to take your questions! We've answered some of this in our FAQ which I have quoted for you below. There are other things that are setting us apart, I hope you will stay tuned for updates as we continue to develop!   How is your coin different from other Supercomputer Coins like SONM and Golem?  It is true, we are very similar to these coins, and we are proud to be so! We think Golem is a valuable token and we will be happy to collaborate with them in the future.  We believe Supercomputer coins are the most valuable tokens out there. They are tied to computer resources which makes them strong assets.  In doing our market research we've reached out to a number of organizations and found the demand for supercomputers is endless, and ever growing with new AI around the corner. There is a lot of revenue in this vast industry, and this will require many networks to handle the load as we target different sections of the market.  While SONM and Golem are targeting commercial applications, we are focused on Educational and Research institutions.  As well, Golem is a Polish company, and SONM is from Russia. While I'm sure they will do well in Europe, we are a Canadian company and will have advantage over them in the North American market.     How does a global network target a geographical market?  Although anyone around the world can connect and use our network for projects, the majority of this space is covered by Universities and Research Institutions. These institutions require a more hands on approach to marketing, and it will be necessary for us to approach them directly and help them migrate work onto our network. Golem (Polish), SONM (Russian) and Iex.ce (French) are focused more on private commercial applications however we expect they will eventually realize this mistake and focus their marketing to European Research Institutions, leaving North American Universities and Researchers to a closer team. That team is us!  What they may not realize is that Research is the underpinning of the supercomputer world. Where private businesses are volatile in their computing needs, Research allows us to provide a steady supply of work to our miners. We will be building this steady base through careful approach before layering a more volatile commercial market on top.  We are based in Kingston Ontario which is home to both the Royal Canadian Military College and Queens University, the oldest in Canada. We have many friends at these institutions and are in the process of connecting with them, and their supercomputing departments.    Similar projects have failed to deliver so far, what makes SPARC different?  Our team is what sets us apart! We have been working together already for many years. We have another successful company which is still growing! (QuetzalPOS.com). While we cannot speak as to the reasons that other projects are behind schedule, what separates us is that we are comfortable with our teammates. We know each others skills, assets, and development speeds so we can effectively plan for the future.
